author: trackreco
body:
#### PR description:

This PR extends the mkFit setup (enabled with `trackingMkFit` modifier, X.7 workflows) to use mkFit in initialStepPreSplitting, as mentioned in [TRK POG meeting 2021-06-14](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1040448/#5-mkfit-status-report).

This PR also includes a technical fix to include a header of `PropagatorWithMaterial` instead of its source file (I have no idea how that ended up there).

#### PR validation:

Workflows 11634.0, 11634.7 run.
title: Enable mkFit for initialStepPreSplitting with trackingMkFit modifier
